S

saveB - Variable in class for_hash_set.Database
A button to save the database to a file
saveCancelB - Variable in class for_hash_set.Database
a cancel button for save in case they don't want to overwrite an existing file
saveConfirmB - Variable in class for_hash_set.Database
a confirm button if the user would like to overwrite a file that already exists
saveFileYN - Variable in class for_hash_set.Database
a boolean to keep track of the save process
saveInputTF - Variable in class for_hash_set.Database
a text field for the user to input the name of a file to load or save
saveToFile(String) - Method in class for_hash_set.AddressInfoCollection
saves the current HashSet to a file by invoking the iterator method on the HashSet to get an iterator object, uses a while loop with the iterator to traverse the HashSet and writes each traversed object to the ObjectOutputStream
search(AddressInfo) - Method in class for_hash_set.AddressInfoCollection
Invokes the contain method on the HashSet with the argument findMe in order to check to see if the AddressInfo object findMe is in the database.
searchB - Variable in class for_hash_set.Database
a button to search for an item input in the TFs
setAddress(Address) - Method in class for_hash_set.AddressInfo
a modifier method that sets the Name
setAllTheTFs() - Method in class for_hash_set.Database
a method to set all of the textfields to empty strings
setCity(String) - Method in class for_hash_set.Address
a modifier method for the city
setFirst(String) - Method in class for_hash_set.Name
a method to set the first name
setLast(String) - Method in class for_hash_set.Name
a method to set the last name
setMiddle(String) - Method in class for_hash_set.Name
a method to set the middle name
setName(Name) - Method in class for_hash_set.AddressInfo
a modifier method that sets the Name
setState(String) - Method in class for_hash_set.Address
a modifier method for the state
setStreet1(String) - Method in class for_hash_set.Address
a modifier method for the street
setStreet2(String) - Method in class for_hash_set.Address
a modifier method for the optional street
setZip(String) - Method in class for_hash_set.Address
a modifier method for the zipcode
sortB - Variable in class for_hash_set.Database
a button to display the database's items by address
stateCB - Variable in class for_hash_set.Database
a comboBox dropdown menu with the states in it as options
stateL - Variable in class for_hash_set.Database
A label to tell the user to select a state from the combo box
STATES - Static variable in class for_hash_set.Address
an array of states for the state combo box
stepsForAdd() - Method in class for_hash_set.Database
the button handler for the add button, it gets the text from the user's input, does a comparison to make sure all of the required information has been provided and sets the background to red if it hasn't been provided, when the information is provided, the TF is turned white again, once all of the relevant information has been provided, the search method is invoked on the AICollection using the newly constructed AddressInfo object as a parameter, if the search returns false, an attempt is made to add the object to the database by invoking add on the AICollection using the AddressInfo object as a parameter then displays the collection
stepsForAlpha() - Method in class for_hash_set.Database
a button handler for the alphabetize button, it resets the errorTF and the displayTA, then it displays the AICollection by invoking the toStringAlphabetical method on the AICollection
stepsForASort() - Method in class for_hash_set.Database
a button handler for the alphabetize button, it resets the errorTF and the displayTA, then it displays the AICollection by invoking the toStringByAddress method on the AICollection
stepsForCancel() - Method in class for_hash_set.Database
A button handler for the delete cancel button, it will reset the errorTF and the GUI An error will display informing that the delete was cancelled.
stepsForConfirm() - Method in class for_hash_set.Database
a button handler for the delete confirm button, it first resets the GUI if the user input something that could be deleted, then this button will be enabled, if pressed, this button will invoke the delete method on the AICollection using the found AddressInfo object the user will be informed of their success and the GUI will be reset, otherwise and error will be given and the GUI will be reset
stepsForDelete() - Method in class for_hash_set.Database
A button handler for the delete button, it resets the errorTF and displayTA, then it constructs an AddressInfo object with three parameters, then it invokes the search method on the AICollection using the object as a parameter.
stepsForLoad() - Method in class for_hash_set.Database
a button handler for the load button, if the user hasn't put in a file name then it gives an error, otherwise it checks to make sure that the file exists and can be read, if that's true then it invokes the loadFromFile method on theAICollection using the filename as a parameter otherwise it gives an error
stepsForSave() - Method in class for_hash_set.Database
A button handler for the save button, if a filename hasn't been provided, in the saveInputTf then an error will be given, otherwise, it checks to make sure the datafile doesn't already exist, and it checks to make sure it isn't a directory and it can be written, if this is all true then it will try to perform the save, if it already exists, then it will ask if it's okay to overwrite the file
stepsForSaveCancel() - Method in class for_hash_set.Database
a button handler for the ForSaveCancel button, it will be enabled if the user put in a file name that already exists.
stepsForSaveConfirm() - Method in class for_hash_set.Database
If the user puts in a filename that already exists, this button will be enabled, if pressed, this button will go through with the save
stepsForSearch() - Method in class for_hash_set.Database
a button handler for the search button, it resets the error message TF, then it constructs and Address info object with three parameters, it searches for the object and if it is found it is displayed, otherwise it displays an error message in the errorTF
street2L - Variable in class for_hash_set.Database
A label to tell the user to input a optional street line in the text field
street2TF - Variable in class for_hash_set.Database
a text field for the user to input the optional street line of the addressInfo
streetL - Variable in class for_hash_set.Database
A label to tell the user to input a street in the text field
streetTF - Variable in class for_hash_set.Database
a text field for the user to input the street of the addressInfo
